item.title: About
item.description: About the author Hello world! My name is Vladimir and I’m a software engineer with a Master degree in Computer Science and background in Content Management Systems. Relevant topics My most recent experience covers these topics: Building and maintaining backends with Node.js and NoFlo Practical use of Flow-based Programming in software architecture and implementation in Go and JavaScript Technical leadership in small teams and keeping agile projects on full sail Full-stack web application engineering (earlier with PHP/Laravel and AngularJS, etc.
